reason.description: Reason for skipping the email send.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the email send skip data was created.

campaignId.description: Unique identifier for the campaign associated with the email send skip data.

itblInternal.description: Internal iterable properties associated with the email send skip data.

documentCreatedAt.description: Date and time when the document was created.

documentUpdatedAt.description: Date and time when the document was last updated.

messageTypeId.description: Identifier for the type of message sent.

transactionalData.description: Transactional data associated with the email send skip.

inventory.description: Inventory details of the transactional data.

eventName.description: Name of the event associated with the transactional data.

name.description: Name of the product associated with the transactional data.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) associated with the transactional data.

email.description: Email address associated with the transactional data.

url.description: URL associated with the transactional data.

price.description: Price of the product in the transactional data.

product_type.description: Type of the product in the transactional data.

compare_at_price.description: Comparison price for the transactional data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the transactional data.

templateId.description: Identifier for the template used for the transactional data.

product_id.description: Identifier for the product associated with the transactional data.

categories.description: Categories associated with the transactional data.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the transactional data was created.

campaignId.description: Unique identifier for the campaign associated with the transactional data.

vendor.description: Vendor of the product in the transactional data.

eventUpdatedAt.description: Date and time when the event was last updated.

discount.description: Discount applied in the transactional data.

imageUrl.description: URL for the image associated with the transactional data.

itblInternal.description: Internal iterable properties associated with the transactional data.

documentCreatedAt.description: Date and time when the document was created.

documentUpdatedAt.description: Date and time when the document was last updated.

contentId.description: Identifier for the content associated with the email send skip data.

messageId.description: Unique identifier for the message related to the email send skip data.

templateId.description: Identifier for the template used in the email send skip data.

email.description: Email address to which the email send skip data corresponds.

userId.description: Identifier for the user associated with the email send skip data.

channelId.description: Identifier for the channel through which the email was sent.
